description: A list of all of your FinSpace environments.

nested_items.name: environments
nested_items.description: A list of all of your FinSpace environments.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AWS account in which the FinSpace environment is created.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of creation of the FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: environmentUrl
nested_items.description: The sign-in URL for the web application of your FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: environmentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of your FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: sageMakerStudioDomainUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the integrated FinSpace notebook environment in your web application.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key id used to encrypt in the FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: dedicatedServiceAccountId
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the dedicated service account associated with your FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: federationMode
nested_items.description: The authentication mode for the environment.

nested_items.name: federationParameters
nested_items.description: Configuration information when authentication mode is FEDERATED.

nested_items.name: samlMetadataDocument
nested_items.description: SAML 2.0 Metadata document from identity provider (IdP).

nested_items.name: samlMetadataURL
nested_items.description: Provide the metadata URL from your SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP).

nested_items.name: applicationCallBackURL
nested_items.description: The redirect or sign-in URL that should be entered into the SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider configuration (IdP).

nested_items.name: federationURN
nested_items.description: The Uniform Resource Name (URN). Also referred as Service Provider URN or Audience URI or Service Provider Entity ID.

nested_items.name: federationProviderName
nested_items.description: Name of the identity provider (IdP).

nested_items.name: attributeMap
nested_items.description: SAML attribute name and value. The name must always be Email and the value should be set to the attribute definition in which user email is set. For example, name would be Email and value http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress. Please check your SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP) documentation for details.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that you can use in a subsequent call to retrieve the next set of results.
